00128 bool
00129 ConnectionManager::wait_for_connection(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00130                                        Timer &timer) {
00131   ConnectionStatePtr conn_state_ptr;
00132 
00133   timer.start();
00134 
00135   {
00136     ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00137     SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00138         m_impl->conn_map.find(addr);
00139     if (iter == m_impl->conn_map.end())
00140       return false;
00141     conn_state_ptr = (*iter).second;
00142   }
00143 
00144   {
00145     boost::mutex::scoped_lock conn_lock(conn_state_ptr->mutex);
00146     boost::xtime drop_time;
00147 
00148     while (!conn_state_ptr->connected) {
00149       boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00150       xtime_add_millis(drop_time, timer.remaining());
00151       if (!conn_state_ptr->cond.timed_wait(conn_lock, drop_time))
00152         return false;
00153     }
00154   }
00155 
00156   return true;
00157 }

00170 void
00171 ConnectionManager::send_connect_request(ConnectionState *conn_state) {
00172   int error;
00173   DispatchHandlerPtr handler(this);
00174 
00175   if (conn_state->local_addr.sin_port != 0)
00176     error = m_impl->comm->connect(conn_state->addr, conn_state->local_addr,
00177                                   handler);
00178   else
00179     error = m_impl->comm->connect(conn_state->addr, handler);
00180 
00181   if (error == Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED) {
00182     conn_state->connected = true;
00183     conn_state->cond.notify_all();
00184   }
00185   else if (error != Error::OK) {
00186     if (conn_state->service_name != "") {
00187       HT_ERRORF("Connection attempt to %s at %s failed - %s.  Will retry "
00188                 "again in %d milliseconds...", conn_state->service_name.c_str(),
00189                 conn_state->addr.format().c_str(), Error::get_text(error),
00190                 (int)conn_state->timeout_ms);
00191     }
00192     else {
00193       HT_ERRORF("Connection attempt to service at %s failed - %s.  Will retry "
00194                 "again in %d milliseconds...", conn_state->addr.format()
00195                 .c_str(), Error::get_text(error), (int)conn_state->timeout_ms);
00196     }
00197 
00198     // reschedule (throw in a little randomness)
00199     boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00200     xtime_add_millis(conn_state->next_retry, conn_state->timeout_ms);
00201 
00202     int32_t milli_adjust = System::rand32() % 2000;
00203     if (System::rand32() & 1)
00204       xtime_sub_millis(conn_state->next_retry, milli_adjust);
00205     else
00206       xtime_add_millis(conn_state->next_retry, milli_adjust);
00207 
00208     // add to retry heap
00209     m_impl->retry_queue.push(conn_state);
00210     m_impl->retry_cond.notify_one();
00211   }
00212 
00213 }

00216 int ConnectionManager::remove(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00217   bool do_close = false;
00218   int error = Error::OK;
00219 
00220   {
00221     ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00222     SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00223         m_impl->conn_map.find(addr);
00224 
00225     if (iter != m_impl->conn_map.end()) {
00226       ScopedLock conn_lock((*iter).second->mutex);
00227       if ((*iter).second->connected)
00228         do_close = true;
00229       else
00230         (*iter).second->connected = true;  // prevent further attempts
00231       m_impl->conn_map.erase(iter);
00232     }
00233   }
00234 
00235   if (do_close)
00236     error = m_impl->comm->close_socket(addr);
00237 
00238   return error;
00239 }

00253 void
00254 ConnectionManager::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00255   ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00256   SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00257       m_impl->conn_map.find(event_ptr->addr);
00258 
00259   if (iter != m_impl->conn_map.end()) {
00260     ScopedLock conn_lock((*iter).second->mutex);
00261     ConnectionState *conn_state = (*iter).second.get();
00262 
00263     if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00264       conn_state->connected = true;
00265       conn_state->cond.notify_all();
00266     }
00267     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR ||
00268              event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00269       if (!m_impl->quiet_mode) {
00270         HT_INFOF("%s; Problem connecting to %s, will retry in %d "
00271                  "milliseconds...", event_ptr->to_str().c_str(),
00272                  conn_state->service_name.c_str(), (int)conn_state->timeout_ms);
00273       }
00274       conn_state->connected = false;
00275       // this logic could proably be smarter.  For example, if the last
00276       // connection attempt was a long time ago, then schedule immediately
00277       // otherwise, if this event is the result of an immediately prior connect
00278       // attempt, then do the following
00279       boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00280       xtime_add_millis(conn_state->next_retry, conn_state->timeout_ms);
00281 
00282       // add to retry heap
00283       m_impl->retry_queue.push(conn_state);
00284       m_impl->retry_cond.notify_one();
00285     }
00286 
00287     // Chain event to application supplied handler
00288     if (conn_state->handler)
00289       conn_state->handler->handle(event_ptr);
00290   }
00291   else {
00292     HT_WARNF("Unable to find connection for %s in map.",
00293              InetAddr::format(event_ptr->addr).c_str());
00294   }
00295 }

00301 void ConnectionManager::operator()() {
00302   ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00303   ConnectionStatePtr conn_state;
00304 
00305   while (!m_impl->shutdown) {
00306 
00307     while (m_impl->retry_queue.empty()) {
00308       m_impl->retry_cond.wait(lock);
00309       if (m_impl->shutdown)
00310         break;
00311     }
00312 
00313     if (m_impl->shutdown)
00314       break;
00315 
00316     conn_state = m_impl->retry_queue.top();
00317 
00318     if (!conn_state->connected) {
00319       {
00320         ScopedLock conn_lock(conn_state->mutex);
00321         boost::xtime now;
00322         boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00323 
00324         if (xtime_cmp(conn_state->next_retry, now) <= 0) {
00325           m_impl->retry_queue.pop();
00326           send_connect_request(conn_state.get());
00327           continue;
00328         }
00329       }
00330       m_impl->retry_cond.timed_wait(lock, conn_state->next_retry);
00331     }
00332     else
00333       m_impl->retry_queue.pop();
00334   }
00335 }
